title: Best of The Herd: 09/25/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/25/2018
description:
Colin says the Steelers are still a talented mess just like they have been for the past few years. He reveals his top ten teams in the NFL and it doesn't include one team for possibly the first time ever. Plus, Chiefs Tight End Travis Kelce tells Colin about playing with Patrick Mahomes and why their offense is so special. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
